article.title: Smiths Detection to Provide Chemical Agent Detectors
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Smiths Detection, Edgewood, Md., was awarded a $6,966,409 modification to a previously award firm-fixed-price contract for the procurement of M41A Joint Chemical Agent Detectors and M4A1 Communications Adapters.Â The Army Contracting Command, Aberdeen Proving Ground, Md., is the contracting activity.
